SELECT log.community_id AS id, community.`name` FROM `browse_log` AS log INNER JOIN community ON community.id = log.community_id WHERE log.user_id = #{userId} AND log.type = 0 GROUP BY log.community_id ORDER BY COUNT( log.user_id ) DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT community.`name` AS communityName, community.id AS communityId, invitation.title AS invitation, invitation.id AS invitationId, `comment`.content, `comment`.time FROM `comment` INNER JOIN invitation ON `comment`.invitation_id = invitation.id INNER JOIN community ON invitation.community_id = community.id WHERE `comment`.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY `comment`.time DESC
